items.value: IF (WIDTH + 1 - %0) |-> (DEPTH + 1 - %1) = BASE_POSITION THEN "gray" ELSIF field((WIDTH + 1 - %0) |-> (DEPTH + 1 - %1)) = 0 THEN "black" ELSIF field((WIDTH + 1 - %0) |-> (DEPTH + 1 - %1)) = 1 THEN "lime" ELSIF field((WIDTH + 1 - %0) |-> (DEPTH + 1 - %1)) = 2 THEN "brown" ELSE "lime" END
IF %0 <= WIDTH & %1 <= DEPTH THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END
